Class JoinableResourceBundleImpl

public class JoinableResourceBundleImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JoinableResourceBundle

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi

Constructor Detail

JoinableResourceBundleImpl

public JoinableResourceBundleImpl(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String fileExtension,
                                  InclusionPattern inclusionPattern,
                                  ResourceHandler resourceHandler)
Protected access constructor, which omits the mappings parameter.

Parameters:
id - the ID for this bundle.
name - String Unique name for this bundle.
fileExtension - String File extensions for this bundle.
inclusionPattern - InclusionPattern Strategy for including this bundle.
resourceHandler - ResourceHandler Used to access the files and folders.
urlPrefix - The prefix to include in URLs whenever this bundle is included in a link.

JoinableResourceBundleImpl

public JoinableResourceBundleImpl(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.lang.String name,
                                  java.lang.String fileExtension,
                                  InclusionPattern inclusionPattern,
                                  java.util.List pathMappings,
                                  ResourceHandler resourceHandler)
Constructor

Parameters:
id - the ID of this bundle
name - Unique name for this bundle.
fileExtension - File extensions for this bundle.
inclusionPattern - Strategy for including this bundle.
pathMappings - Set Strings representing the folders or files to include, possibly with wildcards.
resourceHandler - Used to access the files and folders.
urlPrefix - The prefix to include in URLs whenever this bundle is included in a link.
Method Detail

getId

public java.lang.String getId()
Description copied from interface: JoinableResourceBundle
Returns the ID for this bundle. The URL, which will identify the bundle. It will normally end with .js or .css, since it will be used to refer to the bundle in URLs.

Specified by:
getId in interface JoinableResourceBundle
Returns:
the ID for this bundle

getExplorerConditionalExpression

public java.lang.String getExplorerConditionalExpression()
Description copied from interface: JoinableResourceBundle
For bundles to be included for IE only within a conditional comment, this method returns the expression to use.

Specified by:
getExplorerConditionalExpression in interface JoinableResourceBundle
Returns:
The expression for the conditional comment, or null if the bundle should be included for all browsers.
